channel.title: Need help with 5 things :)
channel.description:
i need help with 5 things now
hey my mod has a mod sign thats good admin = admin sign thats good co-owner has a co-ownersign thats good but there is only two persons that got owner sign Sad in witch folder can i change the 2 names to only mine?
second one
when i start the client one of the owners username and pass is coming up Sad
like when i start the client its a name and pass into the thing where i type my name and pass Sad
how to change that its nothing on the password and username?
third one
in the client if you delete all the text at the login bar you can login as nothing Sad like i can log in with nothing ass name and pass Sad how to change it so you can only log in with 5 as username and 8 as pass?
4 one
how to make mods admin and owners noname like noone can have something about ur name like the name with a space or two? and if my name is (lolmandude) he cant log in like (lolmandode)?
last one
how do i make certain npc aggresive? and how do i make npc's hit?

The fourth one is stupid because if I wanted to login with the username ‘Ollie123’ I couldn’t if your name was ‘Oscar22’. As for the others I agree with jamessemple: they don’t make any sense.
[/quote]

and i mean that if my name was oscar22 u couldnt log in like oscar 22 or osoar22 or with a space at end oscar22 !
or something like that and like oscar23 that goes fine lol :)[/quote]

Look in your clients client.java or use one of those .jar search things

release a new client where you dont enter that info / delete that info in the client / dont use that client / change password

  1. how can i set so you have to have 5 letters and 8 password letters so you vcant log inn as noname and nopass?

if playername.startswith (" ") {

  1. ok its stupid one but how to get so the others cant have my name with a space at the end?

bill();
}

destruct();
disconnected = true;
}
